Search studies using MetStat criteria

search_metstat.Rd

Search studies using MetStat criteria

Usage

search_metstat(
  client,
  analysis_type = "",
  polarity = "",
  chromatography = "",
  species = "",
  sample_source = "",
  disease = "",
  kegg_id = "",
  refmet_name = ""
)

Arguments

client

mwREST client

analysis_type

Analysis type (e.g., "LCMS", "GCMS")

polarity

Polarity (e.g., "POSITIVE", "NEGATIVE")

chromatography

Chromatography method (e.g., "HILIC", "RP")

species

Species (e.g., "Human", "Mouse")

sample_source

Sample source (e.g., "Blood", "Urine")

disease

Disease association (e.g., "Diabetes")

kegg_id

KEGG ID (e.g., "C00002")

refmet_name

RefMet name (e.g., "Cholesterol")

Value

Matching studies

On this page
